AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

borrow(address,address,uint256).details: Can be called by Router or directly by the user

getAllTokensInfo(address).details: This function caches the reserves and user reserves data to avoid multiple heavy calls.

getBalance(address,address).details: First attempts to call balanceOf on the associated aToken; if that fails, falls back to user reserves data.

getBorrowBalance(address,address).details: First attempts to call balanceOf on the associated variable debt token; if that fails, falls back to user reserves data.

params.market: The address of the market token (not used in Aave as all collaterals are cross-market)

returns.collateralAddresses: Array of supported collateral token addresses

params.collateral: The address of the collateral token to check
params.market: The address of the market token (not used in Aave as all collaterals are cross-market)

returns.isSupported: Whether the collateral is supported in Aave

borrowedTokens(address).notice: Returns the list of tokens that the user has borrowed.

getAllTokensInfo(address).notice: Returns all token info for a given user.

getBalance(address,address).notice: Gets the balance for a given token and user.

getBorrowBalance(address,address).notice: Gets the borrow balance for a given token and user.

getSupportedCollaterals(address).notice: Get all supported collaterals for a specific market in Aave

isCollateralSupported(address,address).notice: Check if a collateral token is supported for a specific market in Aave
